alert.note: Alert for Mills; Pottawattamie; Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 2:40AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Mills, eastern Pottawattamie and southeastern Shelby Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 240 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Silver City, or 10 miles southeast of Council Bluffs, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Treynor around 250 AM CDT. Carson and Macedonia around 255 AM CDT. Oakland around 300 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hancock and Walnut. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 40 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
